properties.address: Lot 12, 55 Delayed Build Road, Box Hill NSW 2765
properties.notes: sold - Vacant land purchased 2018, construction delayed, moved in 2024 (5.5 years after land purchase).

user_query: I bought vacant land in 2018 but didn't start building until 2023 due to delays. I moved into the finished house in 2024 - over 5 years after buying the land. Have I lost the main residence exemption for the land period?
